name: pilo
description: RPi-powered lights-out management for servers. Remotely control the keyboard, power, and see the screen of a server.
author: Zach Bloomquist <pilo@chary.us>

scripts.start: yarn workspace frontend start & yarn workspace server start
scripts.clean: yarn workspace frontend clean & yarn workspace server clean
scripts.build: yarn workspace frontend build & yarn workspace server build
scripts.prepack: yarn clean && yarn build && yarn prepare:pkg
